subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: DeMarcus Nelson made two free throws with 1 minute 1 second remaining Saturday to boost No. 7 Duke past North Carolina State, 87-86, and give Mike Krzyzewski his 800th career victory.
snippet: DeMarcus Nelson made two free throws with 1 minute 1 second remaining Saturday to boost No. 7 Duke past North Carolina State, 87-86, and give Mike Krzyzewski his 800th career victory.
